name: Space Pilots
description:
Space Pilots is an Android game, a Top Down Endless Runner 2D placed in the space. 

The goal is to achieve the highest score possible making your way in a series of obstacles that keep appearing in increased difficulty.

This is my second game, the first one being: https://kottler.itch.io/akradion for pc.

Feel free to leave any kind of comment about it.

Thanks for playing!
